get

void &get ( $name )

Fetch an entry's content.
Function Parameters:
- string $name: Entry name.
Function Info:
Returns - mixed Contents of entry. If the entry points to a file, the file content is returned.
Access - public

void is_file ( $name )

Check if an entry points to a file.
Function Parameters:
- string $name: Entry name.
Function Info:
Returns - bool True if entry exists.
Access - public

set

void set ( $name, $data, [$is_file = 0] )

Write a config record.
Function Parameters:
- string $name: Entry name.
- mixed $data: New content of entry.
- boolean $is_file: If true, $data contains the name of a file that holds the content.
Function Info:
Access - public
